title: Can Stinger give movement speed?
body: Since {{item:3101}} is in the new triforce build can it give movement speed now as well? I used to rush the zeal for the triforce for ther early game mobility but I cant do that now with the item until I fully finish the item. What im asking is probably selfish but I would love this change. While were at it give any item that this builds this movement speed as well would be fun to give {{item:3115}} movement speed especially for those satan players MWUAHAHA.

replies.body: I think he wants the movement speed out of combat too.
